assessment-question.definition: Do the targets address the achievement of GES by focusing on reducing relevant pressures and impacts?

answers.option: Target refers to a reduction in the level of a pressure
Target refers to a reduction in the level of an impact
Target refers to a desired level of a pressure in the sea
Target refers to a desired level of an impact in the sea
Target refers to the desired state of an ecosystem component in the sea
Target refers to another topic
Not relevant
2012 target not reported in 2018 (no explanation provided)

51-75% of targets relevant for this descriptor refers to reductions of pressures and/or impacts
26-50% of target relevant for this descriptor refers to reductions of pressures and/or impacts
1-25% of target relevant for this descriptor refers to reductions of pressures and/or impacts

assessment-question.definition: To what extent does the Member State define similar targets to other MS in the region?

answers.option: Target is similar to most (76-100%) MS in the region
Target is similar to many (51-75%) MS in the region
Target is similar to some (26-50%) MS in the region
Target is similar to a few (1-25%) MS in the region
Target is not similar to other MS targets in the region
Not relevant
Not comparable

The MS uses the same targets as some (26-50%) MS in the region
The MS uses the same targets as a few (1-25%) MS in the region
The MS uses targets which are not similar to other MS in the region/Not reported\the information is provided in different formats across MS and it is impossible to compare

assessment-question.definition: To what extent do targets adequately reflect the gap between current (2018) state and GES?

answers.option: Target contributes substantially (76-100%) to gap between current state and GES
Target contributes a lot (51-75%) to gap between current state and GES
Target contributes somewhat (26-50%) to gap between current state and GES
Target contributes a little (1-25%) to gap between current state and GES
Target contribution to gap between current state and GES is not clear (target unclear or gap in status unclear)
Target does not contribute to gap between current state and GES
Not relevant

scoring.option: Targets for this descriptor will contribute substantially (76-100%) to gap between current state and GES
Targets for this descriptor will contribute a lot (51-75%) to gap between current state and GES
Targets for this descriptor will contribute somewhat (26-50%) to gap between current state and GES
Targets for this descriptor will contribute a bit (1-25%) to gap between current state and GES
Unclear whether targets will contribute to gap between current state and GES. Targets will not contribute to gap between current state and GES

Target is not linked to measures
